name: Cosmic Fear: The Lurker
description:
A short gamejam and also spin off from Miyumi Saga Series thought that this is not canon in Miyumiverse.

Something wrong with the space station as the distress call has been activated. Miyumi and her Alpha Rescue Team has been assigned to investigate and solve the problem about the mysterious space crystal. Can she could find out the truth about this space station?

Play as Miyumi as she venture through space research station to find clues and story about the mysterious crystal which causes the station becomes abandoned. Everything you did is become her fate so think carefully.

Features:

  • 4 Endings
  • Puzzle Solving
  • Lots of Easter Eggs
  • Not so long gameplay (Speedrunner approves!)
